name: Slash
description: Strike your enemy with your sword.

name: Shield Ally
description: Use your shield to protect yourself or one ally.

name: Taunt
description: Force all enemies to direct single-target attacks towards you for 2 turns.

debuff.effect: Taunted: Single-target attacks must be directed towards the player who casted Taunt.

name: Diversion
description: Distract an enemy, giving your allies a chance to target its weak point.

name: Shield Bash
description: Bash an enemy with your shield.
effect:
Double Critical Hit chance.

name: Spin Attack

name: Slam

name: Hammer Swing
description: Swing your war hammer and bowl over enemies.
